Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here. [PDF ]

Price: $180.71
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:17:56 UTC – Details)


The Panasonic Cordless Phone KX-TGF575S, with DECT 6.0 and Link2 Cell technology, answering system, dual keypad and 5 cordless phones handsets, allows you to link up to two cell or smart phones and integrate them into the telephone system via Bluetooth, no landline phone line required. All of your contacts stored into your cell or smart phone can be shared with this phone system allowing you access to important contacts right from the handset. Hear who’s calling from across the room without having to get up with text-to-speech announcements in English and Spanish from the base unit and cordless handsets in the home/home office. The Panasonic home phone with answering machine also features easy call block, speakerphone, voice paging, power back up operation and advanced TAD (telephone answering device) functions tie it all together making this system one of the most reliable and functional systems available in the market today. Do not overload power outlets and extension cords. This can result in the risk of fire or electric shock.
Expandable Panasonic Cordless Phone with Answering Machine: 5-handset home phone system with added features to keep you connected; Digital Answering Machine stores 18-min of messages
Interference-Free, Secure Phone Signal: DECT 6.0 wireless technology for whole home coverage and less interference from other electronics; ideal for homes and apartments with thick walls
Bluetooth Phone Connects to Cell and Voice Assistants: Make and receive calls from your cellular device with Link2Cell pairing up to 2 cell phones; connect handsets to Siri, Google Now and S Voice through Voice Assist feature
Bi-Lingual Talking Caller ID and Smart Call Blocker: Talking caller ID announces caller information in English or Spanish; block unwanted calls with the push of a button on telephone handset or main base unit
More Features to Enjoy: Handset to handset intercom and baby monitor function, battery back-up for up to 12-hr talk time when the power goes out, 3000-entry phone book, and more

Advanced Calling Made Easy

Improved five-handset system syncs two smartphones, connects to Siri, Google Now, and S Voice, blocks unwanted callers, includes Talking Caller ID, and a headset jack. Expandable up to six handsets.

Read more

Sync Two Smartphones

The simple push of a button links up to two smartphones to make and receive cell calls routed through your Link2Cell handsets. Advanced Class 1 Bluetooth extends calling range to 330 ft. to easily handle calling from both cell lines simultaneously.

Connect to Siri, Google Now and S Voice

When synced to your smartphone via Link2Cell, you can connect to Siri, Google Now, and S Voice anytime from your handsets with the Voice Assist feature. Simply press ‘Assist’ on the handset or base unit to send voice commands for making phone calls, checking new messages, weather and more, and hear the responses on the handset.

Block Bothersome Callers

With a dedicated Call Block button on each handset, it’s easy to block telemarketers, robocallers, and other unwanted caller numbers. One button registers up to 250 caller numbers — even while the phone is ringing or while you’re talking or listening.

Talking Caller ID

When the phone rings on one side of the room and you’re on the other, Panasonic’s advanced Talking Caller ID in English and Spanish and Text ID tell you who’s calling with text-to-speech announcements from speakers in the base unit and handsets.

Read more

Beyond Intercom

Wake kids for school in the morning and let everyone know when dinner is ready in the evening with Panasonic ‘s exclusive Voice Paging. More than a traditional intercom, VP makes it easy to send clear, simultaneous announcements to every handset in the house, even when family members don’t respond.

Power When the Power Goes Out with Low Battery Alert

Included rechargeable backup batteries keep you connected when the power goes out. With a fully charged handset in the base unit, you’ll have power for up to 12 hours talk time and 7 days standby for calls using other cordless handsets in the house.

Now, when any of your handsets are running low on power, the handsets alert you. And as an added convenience, a large, highly-visible battery status icon on the handset LCD lets you know as well.

Hear Calls from Noisy Places

Whether someone’s calling from a busy city street or a raucous room, Noise Reduction automatically suppresses background interference while also enhancing voice tones for clearer, more comfortable conversations.

Large Backlit Display

A large 1.8-inch high-contrast white backlit LCD and enlarged, easier to see and use dial keys and function control buttons make home and home office call management quicker and more convenient for everyone.

Read more

Additional Calling Conveniences

With the Panasonic KX-TGF575S system, you can program and store up to 3,000 numbers in your phonebook, and enjoy the time-saving convenience of nine speed dial settings and handset-to-handset intercom.

App Alert (for Android) :

Download the Panasonic Link2Cell app to stay informed and up to date via your smartphone, tablet and Link2Cell system. Receive SMS, email, calendar, low battery notice, Facebook, Twitter and Instagram notifications on your Link2Cell base unit and LCD handsets.

Accessories :

The KX-TGF575S base unit is wall-mountable and comes with matching wall bracket and screws. Two rechargeable AAA-size Ni-MH batteries plus a belt clip are also included.

What’s in the Box :

  • KX-TGF575S phone system base unit
  • 5 Cordless handsets
  • 4 Chargers
  • 5 Belt clips
  • Wall mount
  • 10 Rechargeable Ni-MH AAA-size batteries

Read more

From the brand

TCL 30 SE

Revolutionary Viewing

TCL 30XL

Elevate Your Vision

TCL 30 5G

Maximize Your Entertainment

TCL enjoy more

6.53” FHD+ Dotch LCD display: Powered by NXTVISION, will upgrade your visual experience with the sharper details, vibrant images and allow you to enjoy true-to-life color accuracy in everything you present.TCL 10L Unlocked Android Smartphone is made for the US with a one-year US warranty.
Superior clarity day & night: Coming with a 48MP high-res AI camera(48MP+8MP+2MP+2MP) and 6MP front-facing selfie camera, TCL 10L android phone helps you capture crisp and vivid pictures. The AI-powered camera recognizes and enhances scenes & objects for your best creations.
Compatible with GSM carriers(AT&T and T-Mobile). TCL 10L mobile phone is also certified for use on Verizon’s LTE network. If your device is not receiving messages or experiences an error when making phone calls on Verizon, your account may need to be provisioned to support “CDMA-less” devices, please contact Verizon’s technical support team or your account’s business representative for assistance. This phone is not compatible with CDMA networks. (such as Sprint, Spectrum, Xfinity, etc.)
Comfortable viewing all day: Auto-adjusting display provides the best viewing experience regardless of lighting conditions. A 4000mAh battery and Intelligent Battery Mode optimize power usage to keep you cord-free all day. Please know that on TCL 10L phone WIFI calling is only compatible with T-Mobile.

Superior Clarity

TCL 10L unlocked android smartphone capture the moment like never before with an AI quad camera system that integrates auto-brightness, super resolution, HDR & more. There are vibrant pixels in every shot, day or night. Experience 3 times more brightness and capture greater detail even in the darkest of settings.

Greater View

With the TCL 10L android phone you can find the beauty in little things with a Macro Camera that captures the rich textures, and tiny details of all your favorite things.

Full-Scene Photos

TCL 10L’s 118° wide-angle camera includes 3.3 times more of the world in a single shot. Gather your friends for a beautiful sunset and take an unforgettable photo or video – with everyone in it. Snap a breathtaking landscape and be able to capture the entirety of the beauty around you.

Imaginative Video

With the TCL 10L, you can set up shortcut keys in an instant. Get maximum control so you will know exactly what’s happening on your screen and what you’re touching, making life more convenient and effortless for you.

Read more

Smart Key for Fast Access

The Smart Key allows you to customize your TCL 10L mobile phone to access any dedicated app or feature with the press of a button. Make your phone as unique as you.

Effortless Unlocking

Never worry about your phone getting into the wrong hands again. With the convenience and security of two forms of authentication (Face Key and a fingerprint sensor), you get safe and fast access to your cell phone. One simple touch or glance will bring you straight to your favorite apps or important messages.

Powerful Audio

Enjoy a seamlessly connected lifestyle by connecting up to four speakers or headphones at once. Bring the party to life and share your favorite playlist on the go with a personalized listening experience.

Talkback Blind Mode

Optimized Power A 4000mAh battery and Intelligent Battery Mode optimize power usage to keep you cord-free all day.

Read more

Network

Compatible with GSM carriers, including AT&T and T-Mobile. TCL 10L unlocked smartphone is also certified for use on Verizon’s LTE network. If your device is not receiving messages or experiences an error when making phone calls on Verizon, your account may need to be provisioned to support “CDMA-less” devices, please contact Verizon’s team or your account’s business representative for assistance. This phone is not compatible with CDMA networks. (such as Sprint, Spectrum, Xfinity, etc.)

TCL 10L – NXTVISION Display

Optimize your media playback and creative expression with TCL 10L’s NXTVISION visual technology. Experience streaming in a whole new way thanks to an expansive 6.53” FHD+ NXTVISION display with a dedicated display engine that enhances color, clarity and contrast in real time. HDR feature improves ordinary videos so you can enjoy sharp, remastered HDR content no matter the source. Plus, browse and read comfortably with an array of eye protection modes.

Capture greatness with the NXTVISION 48MP AI-powered quad rear camera and 16MP front camera. The quad camera consists of a 48MP high resolution camera, a super wide-angle camera, a macro camera and a depth camera for amazing portraits. Create fun and artistic clips with wide angle and stop motion video modes.

Make life on the go a little easier with a powerful Qualcomm Snapdragon 665 octa-core processor, and a reliable 4000mAh battery with smart power optimization. Tap-and-go with a customizable interface, Smart Key, Face Key and fingerprint sensor that provide access effortlessly.

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here. [PDF ]

Price: $98.77
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:08:04 UTC – Details)


The Panasonic KX TGE433B expandable Digital Enhanced Cordless Telecommunications (DECT) 6.0 Phone system with answering machine and 3 cordless handsets is a smart, reliable home/home office solution designed to make every day call management easier and more convenient for everyone, no landline required. Includes one cordless handset in the base unit and two additional cordless handsets, expandable up to six handsets (additional handsets sold separately). Large, white backlit LCD and dedicated volume control on the included three cordless handsets and base unit are ideal for enhanced visibility and hearing comprehension. One touch Noise Reduction suppresses background interference from callers in noisy locations. Keep tabs on the baby with built in baby monitor, and send clear, simultaneous announcements to every handset in the house with voice paging. Call Block conveniently blocks up to 250 bothersome caller numbers. Plus, Talking Caller ID tells you who’s calling via advanced text to speech announcements, and a powerful battery backup system keeps you connected when the power goes out. Hear who’s calling from across the room without having to get up using text to speech announcements in English and/or Spanish from the phones’ base unit and portable wireless cordless handsets. Connect and converse hands free with crystal clear 2 way, full duplex speakerphone convenience designed into the wireless handsets. Attach an optional Key Detector to your key ring to locate lost keys. Simply activate the detector’s beeping alarm from any cordless phone handset to instantly track down lost keys from up to 200 yards away. Easy call block, speakerphone, voice paging, power back up operation, and advanced TAD (telephone answering device) functions tie it all together making this system one of the most reliable and functional cordless phone systems available in the market today. Guided feature tutorials are available for this cordless phone on the manufacturer’s website. DISCLAIMER: DECT 6.0 is a North American marketing term for Dect devices manufactured for the United States and Canada operating at 1.9 GHz. There are two basic methods available to program your phone. Display Menu Tree Method (Older Model Phones): This method requires pressing the Menu soft key then using the navigation arrows to scroll to the various menus and sub menus of the phone to select the desired programming feature. Direct Command Code Method (Newer Model Phones): This method allows access to the desired programming feature by pressing the Menu soft key, the pound sign, and a 3 or 4 digit number code found in the manual.
BI Lingual Caller ID: Talking caller ID audibly announces caller information in either English or Spanish from the telephone’s base unit and cordless handsets when you can’t view the screen
One Touch Telephone Call Block: Register up to 250 numbers with one touch call block on the cordless phone base unit & cordless handsets; Compatible with hearing Aid T Coil (TIA 1083 compliant)
Panasonic Voice Paging: More than a traditional intercom, voice paging sends clear simultaneous announcements to all cordless handsets at once; Talk Time: 12 hours max
Enhanced cordless phone sound quality noise reduction automatically suppresses background interference while enhancing voice tones for clearer conversation on the base unit & cordless handsets
Secure Long Range phone Signal Dect 6.0 wireless technology offers a long range cordless phone and is ideal for homes and apartments with thick walls

Talking Caller ID in English and Spanish

When the phone rings on one side of the room and you’re sitting on the other, there’s no need to get up. Advanced text-to-speech announcements clearly tell you who’s calling.

Read more

Features

Easy Call Block

With dedicated Call Block buttons on both base unit and handsets, it’s quick and simple to block telemarketers, rob callers and other unwanted numbers. A single push of the button instantly registers numbers into the system’s 250-number call block database.

Voice Paging

Wake kids for school in the morning and let everyone know when dinner is ready in the evening with Panasonic Voice Paging. More than a traditional intercom, VP makes it easy to send clear, simultaneous announcements to every handset in the house, even when family members don’t respond.

Large White Backlit Display

A large 1.8-inch white-backlit LCD and comfortable, efficiently positioned backlit numeric dial keypads and buttons make home and home office calling quick and convenient in any light conditions.

Read more

Hear Calls from Noisy Places

Whether someone’s calling from a busy city street or inside from a raucous room, Noise Reduction automatically suppresses background interference while also enhancing voice tones for clearer, more comfortable conversations.

Speakerphone Convenience

Connect and converse hands-free with crystal-clear 2-way, full duplex speakerphone convenience designed into the handsets.

Keep Tabs on the Baby

With the baby monitor feature, you’ll always know your child is safe. When the child wakes up or starts crying, a monitoring handset in the baby’s room sends an immediate alert to the system’s base unit and any phone or cellphone number you store in the handset.

Read more

Find Lost Keys

Attach an optional Key Detector to your key ring and never lose keys again. Simply activate the detector’s beeping alarm from any KX-TGE433B handset to instantly track down lost keys from up to 200 yards away.

Secure, Long-Range Signal

Designed with DECT 6.0 Plus, the KX-TGE433B system ensures clear sound and added reliability throughout the home. DECT 6.0 also provides signal security to deter eavesdropping and won’t interfere or conflict with routers or other devices.

*1 Requires subscription to a Caller ID service offered by your provider / telephone company.

*3 Optional handset may be required depending on the model.

*5 The base unit gets temporary power supply from a cordless handset in the case of a power outage.

*6 Requires number registration in the call block list.

Read more

The Panasonic KX TGE433B expandable Digital Enhanced Cordless Telecommunications (DECT) 6.0 Phone system with answering machine and 3 cordless handsets is a smart, reliable home/home office solution designed to make every day call management easier and more convenient for everyone, no landline required. Includes one cordless handset in the base unit and two additional cordless handsets, expandable up to six handsets (additional handsets sold separately). Large, white backlit LCD and dedicated volume control on the included three cordless handsets and base unit are ideal for enhanced visibility and hearing comprehension. One touch Noise Reduction suppresses background interference from callers in noisy locations. Keep tabs on the baby with built in baby monitor, and send clear, simultaneous announcements to every handset in the house with voice paging. Call Block conveniently blocks up to 250 bothersome caller numbers. Plus, Talking Caller ID tells you who’s calling via advanced text to speech announcements, and a powerful battery backup system keeps you connected when the power goes out. Hear who’s calling from across the room without having to get up using text to speech announcements in English and/or Spanish from the phones’ base unit and portable wireless cordless handsets. Connect and converse hands free with crystal clear 2 way, full duplex speakerphone convenience designed into the wireless handsets. Attach an optional Key Detector to your key ring to locate lost keys. Simply activate the detector’s beeping alarm from any cordless phone handset to instantly track down lost keys from up to 200 yards away. Easy call block, speakerphone, voice paging, power back up operation, and advanced TAD (telephone answering device) functions tie it all together making this system one of the most reliable and functional cordless phone systems available in the market today. Guided feature tutorials are available for this cordless phone on the manufacturer’s website. DISCLAIMER: DECT 6.0 is a North American marketing term for Dect devices manufactured for the United States and Canada operating at 1.9 GHz. There are two basic methods available to program your phone. Display Menu Tree Method (Older Model Phones): This method requires pressing the Menu soft key then using the navigation arrows to scroll to the various menus and sub menus of the phone to select the desired programming feature. Direct Command Code Method (Newer Model Phones): This method allows access to the desired programming feature by pressing the Menu soft key, the pound sign, and a 3 or 4 digit number code found in the manual.
BI Lingual Caller ID: Talking caller ID audibly announces caller information in either English or Spanish from the telephone’s base unit and cordless handsets when you can’t view the screen
One Touch Telephone Call Block: Register up to 250 numbers with one touch call block on the cordless phone base unit & cordless handsets; Compatible with hearing Aid T Coil (TIA 1083 compliant)
Panasonic Voice Paging: More than a traditional intercom, voice paging sends clear simultaneous announcements to all cordless handsets at once; Talk Time: 12 hours max
Enhanced cordless phone sound quality noise reduction automatically suppresses background interference while enhancing voice tones for clearer conversation on the base unit & cordless handsets
Secure Long Range phone Signal Dect 6.0 wireless technology offers a long range cordless phone and is ideal for homes and apartments with thick walls

Talking Caller ID in English and Spanish

When the phone rings on one side of the room and you’re sitting on the other, there’s no need to get up. Advanced text-to-speech announcements clearly tell you who’s calling.

Read more

Features

Easy Call Block

With dedicated Call Block buttons on both base unit and handsets, it’s quick and simple to block telemarketers, rob callers and other unwanted numbers. A single push of the button instantly registers numbers into the system’s 250-number call block database.

Voice Paging

Wake kids for school in the morning and let everyone know when dinner is ready in the evening with Panasonic Voice Paging. More than a traditional intercom, VP makes it easy to send clear, simultaneous announcements to every handset in the house, even when family members don’t respond.

Large White Backlit Display

A large 1.8-inch white-backlit LCD and comfortable, efficiently positioned backlit numeric dial keypads and buttons make home and home office calling quick and convenient in any light conditions.

Read more

Hear Calls from Noisy Places

Whether someone’s calling from a busy city street or inside from a raucous room, Noise Reduction automatically suppresses background interference while also enhancing voice tones for clearer, more comfortable conversations.

Speakerphone Convenience

Connect and converse hands-free with crystal-clear 2-way, full duplex speakerphone convenience designed into the handsets.

Keep Tabs on the Baby

With the baby monitor feature, you’ll always know your child is safe. When the child wakes up or starts crying, a monitoring handset in the baby’s room sends an immediate alert to the system’s base unit and any phone or cellphone number you store in the handset.

Read more

Find Lost Keys

Attach an optional Key Detector to your key ring and never lose keys again. Simply activate the detector’s beeping alarm from any KX-TGE433B handset to instantly track down lost keys from up to 200 yards away.

Secure, Long-Range Signal

Designed with DECT 6.0 Plus, the KX-TGE433B system ensures clear sound and added reliability throughout the home. DECT 6.0 also provides signal security to deter eavesdropping and won’t interfere or conflict with routers or other devices.

*1 Requires subscription to a Caller ID service offered by your provider / telephone company.

*3 Optional handset may be required depending on the model.

*5 The base unit gets temporary power supply from a cordless handset in the case of a power outage.

*6 Requires number registration in the call block list.

Read more

Price: $34.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:00:07 UTC – Details)


Enjoy the clarity and reliability of a landline phone, with easy-to-use features. Panasonic Cordless Phone KX-TGD610B is a 1-handset home phone system expandable up to 6 handsets (sold separately), with Call Block that make it easy to stop nuisance callers, plus Bilingual Talking Caller ID that announces caller information in English or Spanish, so you’ll never miss an important call. Noise Reduction Technology helps make every call as clear as possible by reducing the surrounding noise coming from the other party’s telephone, audible Low Battery Alert lets you know when battery needs charging and a full range of hands-free phone functions lets you enjoy mobility and flexibility–full duplex speakerphone lets you use your handset hands-free; handset can be used as a monitor for different areas of the house (such as a baby’s room) even while away from home.
Cordless Telephone for Home: High-contrast handset display and backlit keypad makes it easy to view who’s calling and dial even in low-light; Home phone system expands up to 6 cordless handsets (sold separately)
Block Unwanted Callers, Store Important Numbers: Block up to 150 nuisance callers using one-touch Call Block; store up to 100 items in your phonebook and 9 numbers in Speed Dial for quick access to important contacts
Hear More Clearly: Noise Reduction lets you hear the voice of the person you are talking to more clearly by reducing the surrounding noise coming from the other party’s telephone
Hands-Free Phone Functions: Full duplex speakerphone lets you use your handset hands-free and monitor different areas of the house (such as a baby’s room)
Low Battery Alert: Handset provides up to 10 hours of talk time and up to 5 days of standby time, and gives a visual and audible heads-up when the battery is low

Panasonic KX-TGD610B

Cordless Home Phone System with Easy Call Block

Make working from home easier and stress-free by stopping nuisance calls in 1 step. Expandable to 6 handsets, the KX-TGD610B is equipped with Smart Call Block features to avoid nuisance callers and scammers, plus many other features for day-to-day convenience.

See and Dial Clearly

Bright, large display on handset units makes it easy to see who's calling in the language you choose (English or Spanish display). And, a backlit keypad makes it easy to dial even in low-light situations.

Easily Block Unwanted Callers

Say good-bye to scam calls and telemarketers. A one-touch Call Block button lets you easily block nuisance callers. Store up to 150 unwanted caller numbers.

Expand Your System

Keep additional handsets virtually anywhere you need in your home, expanding your phone system up to 6 cordless handsets (sold separately).

9-Number Speed Dial

Store up to 9 numbers on Speed Dial for quick access to important contacts.

Noise Reduction Technology

Reduce the background noise on the caller’s end so you can hear the voice of the person you are talking to more clearly.

100-Number Phone Book

Make calls without having to dial manually with a 100-number memory phonebook.

Speakerphone Doubles as a Baby Monitor*

Place a cordless handset unit in baby's room to audibly monitor from different areas of the house or even while away from home! The monitored handset will call the monitoring handset, base unit, or a stored phone number when it detects sound. *Additional handset (KX-TGDA66M or KX-TGDA63W) required.

Long Battery Life with Audible Low Battery Alert

Enjoy up to 10 hours talk time and 5 days of standby on handsets (while in eco mode). And, you never have to worry about the handset running out of power - audible alerts and visual icons make sure you know when it's time to charge.

This 5 Handset Cordless Phone has a digital answering maching and dual keypad. Hear who’s calling from across the room with talking Caller ID announcements in English and Spanish from the based unit and cordless handsets. Easily block up to 1000 telemarketers with one-touch dedicated call block buttons on base and handsets. Link to Siri, Google or S Voice with the Remote Voice Assist.
BI Lingual Caller ID: Talking caller ID audibly announces caller information in either English or Spanish from the telephone’s base unit and cordless handsets when you can’t view the screen
One Touch Telephone Call Block: Register up to 1000 numbers with one touch call block on the cordless phone base unit & cordless handsets; Compatible with hearing Aid T Coil (TIA 1083 compliant)
Panasonic Voice Paging: More than a traditional intercom, voice paging sends clear simultaneous announcements to all cordless handsets at once; Talk Time: 10 hours max
Enhanced cordless phone sound quality noise reduction automatically suppresses background interference while enhancing voice tones for clearer conversation on the base unit & cordless handsets
Secure Long Range phone Signal DECT 6.0 wireless technology offers a long range cordless phone and is ideal for homes and apartments with thick walls

KX-TGE675B

5 Handsets Cordless Phone System with Link2Cell

Make working from home easier and stress-free with the smart, easy-to-use KX-TGE675B cordless phone system. Connect to a cell phone via Bluetooth for landline-level clarity on mobile calls. Robust,1-step Call Block helps you avoid nuisance callers, and many other features provide daily convenience.

Link2Cell Technology

Make and receive cellphone calls

Pair up to 2 cell phones via Bluetooth with the base unit to get increased call clarity and reliability, avoiding cell dead zones in your home. The handsets alert you when your cell phone receives incoming calls and texts and allow you to make and receive mobile phone calls with landline clarity.

Automated Call Block + One-Touch Call Block

Talk to people, not computers. Automated Call Block stops robocallers from getting through by prompting callers to press “1” to connect their call. Plus, you can easily block other unwanted callers (up to 1000 numbers) with the touch the Call Block button

Designed for Ease-of-Use

This phone is packed with easy-to-use design features. A large 1.88-in display + large button backlit keypad makes it easy to dial and see call info. Turned off the ringer? A bright LED flashes when there’s an incoming call. Volume too low? Use the side volume button to quickly adjust, even mid-call

Expand Your System

Keep additional handsets virtually anywhere you need in your home, expanding your phone system up to 6 cordless handsets (sold separately).

Digital Answering System

Missed a call? Get message notifications even if you're away from home, or retrieve messages easily from the handset; up to 18 minutes of record time.

Noise-Free Talking & Listening

Noise reduction technology lets you hear the voice of the person you are talking to more clearly.

Store Important Numbers

Phonebook stores up to 100 important numbers. Caller ID displays up to 50 entries.

Bilingual Taking Caller ID

Caller ID displays in English or Spanish and announces caller information in the language you choose, so you never miss an important call.

Long Battery Life with Low Battery Alert

Enjoy up to 10 hours talk time and 5 days of standby on handsets (while in eco mode). And, you never have to worry about the handset running out of power - audible alerts and visual icons make sure you know when it's time to charge.

Price: $59.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:28:49 UTC – Details)


The Panasonic Expandable KX-TGB850B Corded Telephone with Cordless Handset and Answering System is an essential phone for any home. With both corded and cordless handsets, it is incredibly versatile, letting you comfortably make and receive calls anywhere in your home. Its large backlit LCD display and intuitive keypad ensure that you can see and complete every call with confidence. Despite its small size, the phone is incredibly powerful, with Caller ID, Block, Phonebook, Redial, and Speed dial — the functions you need at your fingertips. Line Power Mode keeps this phone functioning even during temporary blackouts. Powerful everyday long battery life provides 180 hours in Standby and 9 hours in Talk. DECT 6.0 technology ensures the clarity of each call even when the handset is in a different part of the home than the telephone base. Optional Handset: KX-TGBA85B.
Wired home phone with cordless handset and answering system: Telephone system provides both a sturdy base unit and a light, compact handset. A comfortable phone for the office or the home.
Easy to See, Easy to Use: Large LCD display with Intuitive design makes phone’s features easily accessible.
Blackout, No problem: Line power mode keeps the phone functioning even in the event of a brief power outage. Everyday long battery life of 180 hours in Standby and 9 hours in Talk.
The features you need every day: Speakerphone, Caller ID, Call block (50 numbers), Phonebook (70 items), Redial list (10 items) and Speed dial (2 numbers).
3 display languages: LCD displays in English, Spanish, and French.

Panasonic KX-TGB850B

A Corded and Cordless Phone for Every Need

The Panasonic KX-TGB850B telephone contains both a corded phone with answering system, and a compact cordless handset to take anywhere in the home. Easy to use and packed with features, it ensures that every call is smooth and clear.

Includes a Compact Cordless Handset

A great choice even for the smallest table or countertop. Wall-mountable, too!

Corded Phone and Answering Machine

Make and answer calls easily with phone’s intuitive design. Backlit LCD ensures you can clearly read the display. Clear buttons make sure you dial correctly every time. Integrated answering machine ensures you never miss a message.

Caller ID

See who’s calling before you pick up.

Easy Call block

Hate annoying robocalls and solicitors? Block up to 50 numbers with ease using the dedicated call block button.

Phonebook +Speed Dial +Redial

For quick and easy dialing, program up to 70 contacts and 9 speed dial numbers, plus, phone memory automatically saves the last ten dialed calls.

Expandable System

Connect up to 4 additional optional cordless handsets (KX-TGBA85, sold separately) to customize your telephone needs.

DECT 6.0 Technology

Enjoy clear calls every time, even when the headset is in a different part of the home than the telephone base.

Blackout-Friendly

Line power mode ensures your telephone will work for a limited time, even during a temporary blackout. The base unit will work as a standard telephone using power from the telephone line, so you can still make and answer outside calls with the corded handset. However, this operation may not work properly depending on area or telephone line’s condition.

The base unit speakerphone and the cordless handset will not function during a power failure.

4
Price: $59.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:28:49 UTC – Details)
